DOC.HEADLINE: FOOTBALL ' 94 / HIGH_SCHOOL COACHES SHOW OFF THEIR TRICKS ! ; A LITTLE BIT OF HISTORY
DOC.TEXT: Quarterback Mike Owens led Van Nuys High to a share of the City Section 3-A Division title in 1980 by passing for 2 # 081 yards and 24 touchdowns and rushing for 13 touchdowns . Van Nuys and Narbonne tied , 14-14 , in the championship game .
